definition: to construct by hoisting ready-built components into place
to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person
a string of 100 cash (arch.)/to lament/to condole with/variant of 吊[diao4]
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: The example perfects further for the non-support cable hoisting system in our country.
sentences.chinese: 该桥是对我国无支架缆索吊装系统的进一步完善。

sentences.english: Superstructure assembly of prefabrication is new technique of ship building.
sentences.chinese: 上层建筑整体吊装是船舶建造中一项新工艺。

sentences.english: Plants installed below beams or floor are supported by support suspended frame.
sentences.chinese: 吊装于梁下或楼板下的设备均采用弹性支吊架吊装。

sentences.english: Plants installed below beams or floor are supported by support suspended frame.
sentences.chinese: 吊装于梁下或楼板下的设备均采用弹性支吊架吊装。

sentences.english: A new computer aided technique has been mentioned for appraising interference phenomenon in the process of hoisting the utility boiler.
sentences.chinese: 提出了电站锅炉吊装中干涉现象的计算机评判技术。

sentences.english: In accordance with above-mentioned requirements, assembling sequence should be crane's route.
sentences.chinese: 根据上述要求吊装顺序以起重机行驶路线进行。

sentences.english: Another structure parts and the small apart piece, Adopt the tower crane to hoist .
sentences.chinese: 其他构件和小型散件，采用塔吊吊装。

sentences.english: A technique of computationally simulating the direct barging lifting is suggested.
sentences.chinese: 研究浮式起重船吊装过程的计算机仿真技术。

sentences.english: Your goods are being swung onto the train.
sentences.chinese: 你的货物正在往火车上吊装。

sentences.english: The tail gas chimney tower frame in Zhong county natural gas purifying project was needed to hoist.
sentences.chinese: 在忠县天然气净化厂工程中要吊装尾气烟囱塔架。

sentences.english: Deckmen placed the goods and proceeded hoist tasks.
sentences.chinese: 水手班进行物品摆放及吊装作业等。

sentences.english: Disengager before lifting above head, that is to carry out the installation of internal components.
sentences.chinese: 沉降器封头段吊装前，即要进行内部构件的安装。

sentences.english: Flat lifting belt is made by using 100%PES to prepare the suture.
sentences.chinese: 扁平吊装带是采用100%PES通过编制缝合制成。

sentences.english: Records of lifting equipment maintenance and inspection activities are retained by the production Manager.
sentences.chinese: 吊装设备维护和检验记录由生产经理保存。

sentences.english: The fuel capsules with Uriniaum were transported in place with this special crane.
sentences.chinese: 装有核燃料铀的储罐使用这种特制吊装设备安装到位。

sentences.english: Strong fiber hoisting belt shaping products have passed the sampling test.
sentences.chinese: 高强纤维吊装带成型产品通过抽样试验。

definition: construction/to carry out construction or large-scale repairs
roof/roof plate/rock layer forming roof of a cave or mine/abacus
to join the two sections (of a linear structure: bridge, dike etc) to complete its construction
a boom (i.e. transverse beam for hanging objects)
